entry.title: Hello everyone!
entry.content:
My Food Porn

Hello everyone, thanks for checking out my blog, My Food Porn ! Like home cooked, comforting food
from all over the world? If so I think you will love my food! I like to cook all kinds of food including
Asian cooking (especially Japanese), Italian (im part italian) and southern food (im from Georgia), so no
matter what kind of food you like you will probably see something here you like along with simple, easy to follow
instructions on how you can make these meals yourself!

I plan on posting pretty regularly, atleast twice a week if possible. I cant wait to sahre my food with you and
I hope you enjoy reading about it as much as I like cooking it!

Also, if you would like to see some pictures (this is My Food Porn right (:) feel free to check out my gallery
here.

Thanks again!
